Hello! I'm happy to help you find some romantic comedies that you might enjoy. Here are a few recommendations based on your interest in the genre:

1. Crazy Rich Asians (2018) - A romantic comedy that follows a young Asian-American woman as she travels to Singapore to meet her boyfriend's wealthy and traditional family.

2. To All the Boys I've Loved Before (2018) - A romantic comedy about a high school girl who writes letters to all of the boys she has ever had a crush on, only to have them accidentally sent out.

3. The Proposal (2009) - A romantic comedy about a demanding boss who forces her assistant to pretend to be her fiancé, only to find themselves falling in love.

4. Love Actually (2003) - A romantic comedy that follows the interconnected love stories of multiple couples in the weeks leading up to Christmas.

5. Bridget Jones's Diary (2001) - A romantic comedy based on the popular novel, following the life of a single woman in London as she navigates her love life and struggles with her weight.

6. My Best Friend's Wedding (1997) - A romantic comedy about a woman who realizes she's in love with her best friend just as he's about to get married.

7. Sleepless in Seattle (1993) - A romantic comedy about a widower who falls in love with a journalist after she hears him on a radio talk show.

8. When Harry Met Sally (1989) - A romantic comedy about two friends who try to keep their relationship platonic, but find themselves falling in love.

9. Pretty Woman (1990) - A romantic comedy about a successful businessman who hires a prostitute to be his escort for the week, only to find himself falling in love with her.

10. The Wedding Singer (1998) - A romantic comedy about a wedding singer who falls in love with a waitress after he's left at the altar.

I hope you enjoy these recommendations! Let me know if you have any other questions.

resp:
I'm glad to help you find a good movie for your girlfriend! Based on your conversation, I recommend the following movies:

1. The Proposal (2009) - Starring Ryan Reynolds and Sandra Bullock, this romantic comedy is a great choice for a date night.

2. Crazy Rich Asians (2018) - This romantic comedy-drama features a diverse cast and is a great choice for anyone looking for a lighthearted film.

3. To All the Boys I've Loved Before (2018) - This romantic comedy follows a high school girl who writes letters to all of the boys she has ever had a crush on, only to have them accidentally sent out.

4. The Big Sick (2017) - This romantic comedy-drama tells the story of a comedian who falls in love with a graduate student, but their relationship is put to the test when she falls into a coma.

5. Bridget Jones's Diary (2001) - This romantic comedy follows the life of a single woman in London as she navigates her love life and career.

6. Love Actually (2003) - This romantic comedy follows the lives of eight different couples in the weeks leading up to Christmas.

7. The Devil Wears Prada (2006) - This romantic comedy follows a young journalist as she navigates the world of fashion and becomes the assistant to a demanding editor.

8. The Fault in Our Stars (2014) - This romantic drama follows two teenagers who fall in love despite both being diagnosed with cancer.

9. 50 First Dates (2004) - This romantic comedy follows a man who falls in love with a woman who has short-term memory loss and must win her over every day.

10. The Wedding Crashers (2005) - This romantic comedy follows two friends who crash weddings to meet women, but end up falling in love with each other.

11. My Best Friend's Wedding (1997) - This romantic comedy follows a woman who realizes she's in love with her best friend just as he's about to get married.

12. When Harry Met Sally (1989) - This romantic comedy follows two friends who try to keep their relationship platonic, but end up falling in love.

13. Sleepless in Seattle (1993) - This romantic comedy follows a widower who falls in love with a journalist after she hears him on a radio talk show.

14. You've Got Mail (1998) - This romantic comedy follows two rival bookstore owners who fall in love online without realizing they're competing against each other in real life.

15. 10 Things I Hate About You (1999) - This romantic comedy follows two high school students who fall in love despite their initial dislike for each other.

16. She's All That (1999) - This romantic comedy follows a popular high school student who makes a bet with his friends that he can turn an unpopular girl into a prom queen.

17. Can't Hardly Wait (1998) - This romantic comedy follows a group of high school graduates as they party at a house before going off to college.

18. Cruel Intentions (1999) - This romantic comedy follows two step-siblings who make a bet with each other to see who can seduce their English teacher first.

19. The Notebook (2004) - This romantic drama follows two young lovers who are separated by their social differences but find their way back to each other years later.

20. La La Land (2016) - This romantic musical follows a jazz pianist and an aspiring actress as they fall in love and pursue their dreams in Los Angeles.

I hope these recommendations help you find a great movie for your date night! Let me know if you have any other questions.
